metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7074 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS before 3.4.11 and 4.0.2, and PowerDNSrecursor before 4.0.4, allowing an attacker in position ofman-in-the-middle to alter the content of an AXFR because of insufficientvalidation of TSIG signatures. A missing check that the TSIG record is thelast one, leading to the possibility of parsing records that are notcovered by the TSIG signature.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
